title: This game hates me
body:
Another game another problem. Will probably get leavebuster for this since I have to re-download the game apparently.

Client starts fine, join game fine, pick character fine, game starts loading... crashes

replies.body:
I would make sure to troubleshot these errors in a custom or practice game instead of hoping it'll just go away on its own before you end up getting any punishments for multiple leaves!

There could be a number of different things that could cause something like this dll error. First off, run a quick repair to make sure all the files are still intact and working properly. After that, check that your firewalls/antivirus aren't blocking those files or your network's connection attempts by following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
